findings.title: Third-party resource security issue
findings.description: Be cautious of any third-party JavaScript/CSS/image, etc., link resources introduced in the web frontend, especially JavaScript. This may lead to blacklisting due to the third-party being compromised, resulting in the implantation of malicious code in JavaScript, leading to frontend attacks targeting users, such as wallet address hijacking.

findings.title: CORS security audit issue
findings.description: Add an unexpected Origin header with the Access-Control-Allow-Origin header set to -, allowing access from all origins by default.
